stories.Title: Governance of superintelligence
stories.Description: A recent post by OpenAI's founders emphasized the need for a global regulatory body to address the challenges ahead, given AI's rapid development and potential dangers.
stories.Tweet: Governance of superintelligence 📦 A recent post by OpenAI's founders emphasized the need for a global regulatory body to address the challenges ahead, given AI's rapid development and potential dangers. #openai https://openai.com/blog/governance-of-superintelligence

stories.Title: Anthropic sets new standards in AI innovation
stories.Description: With a $450 million funding boost, the San Francisco-based AI startup is prioritizing research on artificial intelligence ethics and safety, while also planning to improve its Claude chatbot.
stories.Tweet: Anthropic sets new standards in AI innovation 📦 With a $450 million funding boost, the San Francisco-based AI startup is prioritizing research on artificial intelligence ethics and safety, while also planning to improve its Claude chatbot. #anthropic https://venturebeat.com/ai/anthropic-secures-450m-in-series-c-funding-from-google-salesforce-and-others/

stories.Title: Meta's commitment to language diversity
stories.Description: Language inclusivity and preservation are prioritized by the company through its Massively Multilingual Speech project. The open-source AI models can identify over 4,000 spoken languages.
stories.Tweet: Meta's commitment to language diversity 📦 Language inclusivity and preservation are prioritized by the company through its Massively Multilingual Speech project. The open-source AI models can identify over 4,000 spoken languages. #meta https://about.fb.com/news/2023/05/ai-massively-multilingual-speech-technology/

stories.Title: Photoshop gets AI-powered
stories.Description: Adobe has introduced Firefly-based features to their photo editing software, offering users the power of generative AI to add objects, extend images, and remove elements with precision.
stories.Tweet: Photoshop gets AI-powered 📦 Adobe has introduced Firefly-based features to their photo editing software, offering users the power of generative AI to add objects, extend images, and remove elements with precision. #adobe https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/23/adobe-brings-fireflys-generative-ai-to-photoshop/

stories.Title: Bill Gates predicts the future of AI
stories.Description: In a recent event, Microsoft's co-founder stated that the future of AI belongs to the company that comes up with a personal digital agent capable of performing tasks for users.
stories.Tweet: Bill Gates predicts the future of AI 📦 In a recent event, Microsoft's co-founder stated that the future of AI belongs to the company that comes up with a personal digital agent capable of performing tasks for users. #microsoft https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/22/bill-gates-predicts-the-big-winner-in-ai-smart-assistants.html

stories.Title: Apple seals multibillion-dollar deal
stories.Description: In partnership with Broadcom, the company is revolutionizing wireless connectivity and 5G advancements by developing high-quality radio frequency components.
stories.Tweet: Apple seals multibillion-dollar deal 📦 In partnership with Broadcom, the company is revolutionizing wireless connectivity and 5G advancements by developing high-quality radio frequency components. #apple https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/23/apple-announces-multibillion-dollar-deal-with-broadcom-for-us-made-chips.html

stories.Title: Stay tuned for Microsoft’s developer conference!
stories.Description: Build 2023 starts today, watch the keynotes live and be a part of the excitement as Microsoft unveils its plans for the future.
stories.Tweet: Stay tuned for Microsoft’s developer conference! 📦 Build 2023 starts today, watch the keynotes live and be a part of the excitement as Microsoft unveils its plans for the future. #microsoft https://www.engadget.com/watch-the-microsoft-build-keynotes-here-starting-at-12pm-et-023009440.html?src=rss

stories.Title: Ford's EV lineup keeps expanding
stories.Description: Focusing on its strengths, the automaker brings electric versions of customer favorites to the market. Their latest lineup includes a new full-size pickup and three-row SUV EVs.
stories.Tweet: Ford's EV lineup keeps expanding 📦 Focusing on its strengths, the automaker brings electric versions of customer favorites to the market. Their latest lineup includes a new full-size pickup and three-row SUV EVs. #ford https://electrek.co/2023/05/22/ford-details-new-electric-truck-three-row-suv/

stories.Title: Introducing: Trogon
stories.Description: With support for Click and future compatibility with other libraries/languages, Trogon extracts a schema from your app, builds a Textual UI, and makes editing and running commands easier.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: Trogon 📦 With support for Click and future compatibility with other libraries/languages, Trogon extracts a schema from your app, builds a Textual UI, and makes editing and running commands easier. #programming https://github.com/Textualize/trogon

stories.Title: Dify AI: Create apps in minutes
stories.Description: This open-source platform simplifies building, deploying, and optimizing language model applications.
stories.Tweet: Dify AI: Create apps in minutes 📦 This open-source platform simplifies building, deploying, and optimizing language model applications. #programming https://www.producthunt.com/posts/dify-ai

stories.Title: You have 15 minutes to change your mind
stories.Description: The highly anticipated editing feature has finally been added to WhatsApp. Users can now fix typos and add missing details within a 15-minute timeframe.
stories.Tweet: You have 15 minutes to change your mind 📦 The highly anticipated editing feature has finally been added to WhatsApp. Users can now fix typos and add missing details within a 15-minute timeframe. #whatsapp https://www.businessinsider.com/whatsapp-will-allow-users-to-edit-messages-within-15-minutes-2023-5

title: Apple partners with Broadcom, OpenAI reflects on AI regulation, Microsoft Build 2023 starts today
